---
title: 'Data check tests report'
date: "`r date()`"
output:
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_float:
      collapsed: true
---

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
for (i in unique(result_test$dc)) {
  cat(paste("\n\n#", i, "\n"))
  d <- result_test[result_test$dc == i]
  d$dc <- NULL
  d %>%
    knitr::kable() %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      full_width = FALSE,
      bootstrap_options = "striped"
    ) %>%
    kableExtra::row_spec(
      which(d$observed == "pass"), background = c("#bce4b4")
    ) %>%
    kableExtra::row_spec(
      which(d$observed == "fail"), background = c("#c09697")
    ) %>%
    print()
}
```
